title: No fun is allowed in this fucking game

replies.body: Soooooo, you're upset that people dodge when their champion they wanted to play gets picked, but then you dodge twice when yours gets banned

> [{quoted}](name=The Wolf King,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ab05GIJN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-22T19:57:23.323+0000)
>
> Soooooo, you're upset that people dodge when they're champion they wanted to play gets picked, but then you dodge twice when yours gets banned

Hypocrisy doesn't exist in the eyes of blissful ignorance.

> [{quoted}](name=The Wolf King,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ab05GIJN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-22T19:57:23.323+0000)
>
> Soooooo, you're upset that people dodge when their champion they wanted to play gets picked, but then you dodge twice when yours gets banned

That's not the problem. The fact that people abuse being in a past lobby and banning a champion is toxic it's basically another version of ghosting.

Don't take it so personally, lots of people ban Darius because they don't like playing against him.

If you're afraid of being ghosted just exit queue whenever somebody else dodges, wait a few minutes, then queue up again. You won't get the same 8-9 players that way, so there's no way the other team could know to ban Darius just because of you.

> [{quoted}](name=Eckheart,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ab05GIJN,comment-id=00030002,timestamp=2018-03-22T20:37:58.935+0000)
>
> That's not the problem. The fact that people abuse being in a past lobby and banning a champion is toxic it's basically another version of ghosting.

It could also be the fact that {{champion:122}} is a very high ban rate champion who is only going to get even stronger thanks to that new rune. Honestly, he would be my top ban list champion if I didn't have such a hatred for {{champion:75}} but if Nasus is already banned then I auto ban Darius. (Though I only really ban Darius if I am going top lane. I don't mind Darius's Mid/Late game or team fighting, just lanning against him is not fun at all and ruins any hope for the early game.)

What about the fun of all the people who's time you wasted when you dodged twice?

Take some time to reflect on that.
well if you play darius no, no fun is allowed for enemy toplaner
Play blind, no bans to worry about then.
Try playing with friends so you only have the enemy team to worry about getting tilted for you picking Darius.

That's because it's not a game...it's a lifestyle.

Fortnite is a game, Monopoly is a game

League is....League.
